title: Looking to make a social silver team
body:
I'm looking to make a silver team for mainly learning and growing, half fun, half serious...

We would begin by just trying out together and seeing how it all works...

Fluid schedule, mostly playing together when we are available rather than a set time table.

Add me on: Noodle of Power, and message me to show your interest.

replies.body: i started a silver (it was actually gold last season) club and they are great people and are always up for a duo. everyone is always asking to 5 man or duo if you wanna join just send me an add :)
Hey mate, I'm a silver support player looking for some team play.  Add me - VenusWilliams
